author: Crystalwarrior
long_description:
# simplecoins
Mod for simple, extremely stackable coins to be used by other mods for trading, currency and inventory management.
Each coins item stacks up to 9999.

[lods of emone](https://youtu.be/ULeDlxa3gyc)

![coinstack](https://content.luanti.org/thumbnails/2/abc5352774.png)

(If [this engine PR](https://github.com/minetest/minetest/pull/12614) is merged, there can be multiple item textures depending on stack count!)
name: simplecoins
short_description: Mod for simple, extremely stackable coins to be used by other mods for trading, currency and inventory management.
title: SimpleCoins
